ivardefs.name: created
ivardefs.desc: The date this resource was created.

ivardefs.name: dateWritten
ivardefs.desc: The date (and perhaps time) when the prescription was written.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a resource that identifies the particular occurrence of contact between patient and health care provider during which the prescription was issued.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this vision prescription.

ivardefs.name: lensSpecification_
ivardefs.desc: Contain the details of  the individual lens specifications and serves as the authorization for the fullfillment by certified professionals.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: A resource reference to the person to whom the vision prescription applies.

ivardefs.name: prescriber
ivardefs.desc: The healthcare professional responsible for authorizing the prescription.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

properties.desc: An authorization for the provision of glasses and/or contact lenses to a patient.
